sources.title: Dancing Ninja | Full Movie | Action Crime | David Hasselhoff
sources.description:
Dancing Ninja - An orphaned boy who dreams of being a ninja arrives in Hollywood to try and find his birth parents, but gets mixed up in a crime.
2010.  Stars: Lucas Grabeel, David Hasselhoff, Judy Jung-hwa Kang
